contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 6, 1938 D Kirkcaldy Contest
Kirkcaldy Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
kirkcaldy-contest
From the North
Raith Park, Kirkcaldy, Fife, Scotland, UK March contest - 1st Tullis Russell, 2nd Leslie and District, 3rd Barry Ostlere and Shepherd. Hymn tune contest - 1st Coltness Works, 2nd Tullis Russell. Best section 3 or 4 band - 20th Armoured Car Corps. 3rd annual contest in aid of Kirkcaldy Hospital. 12 bands competed.
Jan. 20, 2014, 12:59 p.m. Jan. 23, 2019, 11:24 a.m.
1 Wellesley Colliery Band Herbert Bennett
2 Newmains George Hawkins
3 Tullis Russell Mills John Haldane
4 Barry, Ostlere & Shepherd John Faulds
5 Douglas Colliery Gregor Grant
6 Leslie & District Charles Terris
Unknown Result 20th Armoured Corps (Kirkcaldy) David Briggs
Unknown Result Bowhill Colliery and District Silver Band Unknown
